columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the database account.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a database account uniquely.

columns.name: kind
columns.description: Indicates the type of database account.

columns.name: type
columns.description: Type of the resource.

columns.name: connector_offer
columns.description: The cassandra connector offer type for the Cosmos DB database C* account.

columns.name: consistency_policy_max_interval
columns.description: The time amount of staleness (in seconds) tolerated, when used with the Bounded Staleness consistency level.

columns.name: consistency_policy_max_staleness_prefix
columns.description: The number of stale requests tolerated, when used with the Bounded Staleness consistency level.

columns.name: database_account_offer_type
columns.description: The offer type for the Cosmos DB database account.

columns.name: default_consistency_level
columns.description: The default consistency level and configuration settings of the Cosmos DB account.

columns.name: disable_key_based_metadata_write_access
columns.description: Disable write operations on metadata resources (databases, containers, throughput) via account keys.

columns.name: document_endpoint
columns.description: The connection endpoint for the Cosmos DB database account.

columns.name: enable_analytical_storage
columns.description: Specifies whether to enable storage analytics, or not.

columns.name: enable_automatic_failover
columns.description: Enables automatic failover of the write region in the rare event that the region is unavailable due to an outage.

columns.name: enable_cassandra_connector
columns.description: Enables the cassandra connector on the Cosmos DB C* account.

columns.name: enable_free_tier
columns.description: Specifies whether free Tier is enabled for Cosmos DB database account, or not.

columns.name: enable_multiple_write_locations
columns.description: Enables the account to write in multiple locations.

columns.name: is_virtual_network_filter_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether to enable/disable Virtual Network ACL rules.

columns.name: disable_local_auth
columns.description: Disable local authentication and ensure only MSI and AAD can be used exclusively for authentication. Defaults to false.

columns.name: key_vault_key_uri
columns.description: The URI of the key vault, used to encrypt the Cosmos DB database account.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning state of the database account resource.

columns.name: public_network_access
columns.description: Indicates whether requests from Public Network are allowed.

columns.name: server_version
columns.description: Describes the ServerVersion of an a MongoDB account.

columns.name: backup_policy
columns.description: The object representing the policy for taking backups on an account.

columns.name: capabilities
columns.description: A list of Cosmos DB capabilities for the account.

columns.name: cors
columns.description: A list of CORS policy for the Cosmos DB database account.

columns.name: failover_policies
columns.description: A list of regions ordered by their failover priorities.

columns.name: ip_rules
columns.description: A list of IP rules.

columns.name: locations
columns.description: A list of all locations that are enabled for the Cosmos DB account.

columns.name: private_endpoint_connections
columns.description: A list of Private Endpoint Connections configured for the Cosmos DB account.

columns.name: read_locations
columns.description: A list of read locations enabled for the Cosmos DB account.

columns.name: restore_parameters
columns.description: Parameters to indicate the information about the restore.

columns.name: virtual_network_rules
columns.description: A list of Virtual Network ACL rules configured for the Cosmos DB account.

columns.name: write_locations
columns.description: A list of write locations enabled for the Cosmos DB account.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
